items.headline: Lisa Cook’s Trump lawsuit opens new chapter in showdown over Fed independence
items.summary_en: Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook on Thursday sued President Donald Trump after he moved to fire her over accusations of mortgage fraud, opening a new chapter in a showdown over the independence of the U.S. central bank.

items.headline: Fed’s Waller backs a series of interest-rate cuts over the next six months
